snippet: “A Gentleman’s Guide to Love and Murder” led the award tally for the Outer Critics Circle, a group of theater writers outside of New York.
abstract: Outer Critics Circle, group of theater writers outside of New York, announces winners of its 64th annual competition for Broadway and Off Broadway productions; musical A Gentleman’s Guide to Love & Murder leads with four honors, including best new Broadway musical.
lead_paragraph: “A Gentleman’s Guide to Love and Murder” led the award tally for the Outer Critics Circle, a group of theater writers outside of New York.

headline.print_headline: Theater Critics Group Announces Its Winners
headline.main: Theater Critics Group Announces Its Winners
